titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Records of First Lady, 2006-2010
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
the Library of Virginia 52180
titlepage.author: Paige Neal

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Records of First Lady, 2014-2017. Accession 52180, State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession 52180 transferred from the Office of the First Lady on January 12, 2018.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: records consist of 19 archival boxes and are divided into 4 series. Series have been designated for Correspondence (I), Initiatives (II), Scheduling Office (III), and Subject files (IV). These records document the work of the First Lady during the McAuliffe administration and were created or collected, 2014-2017, though some documents in this collection pre-date this time period.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following series:

scopecontent.p: The vast majority of the correspondence in this series is comprised of thank you notes to the First Lady for her appearance at events or involvment in projects.

Initiatives, 2014-2017, are housed in 9 archival boxes and organized into 3 subseries for: I. Transportation legislation and funding, 2006-2007; II. Transportation Bill (HB 3202), 2007; and III. Transportation Special Session, 2008. This series focuses on Governor Kaine's transportation priorities and plans, funding and projects. Includes correspondence, budgets, legislation, draft legislation, presentations, reports, revenue data, statistical analyses, summaries, and talking points.
